price: 20. Magaalák exxak xerrikek yarde num yemeete, yi-maraw farmoytit kataya keenik iyye,
arabic: وَجَآءَ مِنۡ أَقۡصَا ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ رَجُلٞ يَسۡعَىٰ قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱتَّبِعُواْ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wajāa min aqṣā al-madīnati rajulun yasʿā qāla yāqawmi ittabiʿū al-mur'salīna
